medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms started approximately 45 minutes before arrival to the ED after eating soup. The pain is described as constant and burning, mildly radiating to the flank, and has occurred for the last 2 days, waking the patient from sleep for each instance lasting approximately 1 hour.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension; past surgical history includes supracervical hysterectomy and two C-sections.
medical_history.social_history: Denies significant NSAID or alcohol use; started diet pills (phentermine and topiramate) recently.
